name: Carolina Pulled Pork Slow Cooker Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Fuel your football-loving guests with a slow-cooked dip starring McCormick® Slow Cookers BBQ Pulled Pork Seasoning Mix. Load your crock up with pork tenderloin, cheese, vinegar, brown sugar and dill pickles. Set it. Forget it. And come back to a sweet and tangy dip that's packed with meat, cheese and bold flavor – all of the game day essentials.
ingredients: 1 pound pork tenderloin, cut into 1-inch chunks
1 (1.6 oz) package McCormick® Slow Cookers BBQ Pulled Pork Seasoning Mix
½ cup firmly packed brown sugar
8 ounces processed cheese product, such as Velveeta®, cubed
directions: Sprinkle with 2 tablespoons of the Seasoning Mix; toss to coat
Mix brown sugar, vinegar, pickles and remaining Seasoning Mix in slow cooker
Add seasoned pork into slow cooker
Cook 3 1/2 to 4 hours on HIGH or until pork is tender
Add cheese; cover and let stand 10 minutes or until cheese is melted
